source.name: Consensus Mechanisms in Blockchain
source.instructions: 共识机制在区块链网络中的主要目的是什么？

answers.answer: 因为隐私原因，对交易数据加密
保证所有节点对区块链状态达成共识
进行新的加密货币挖矿

source.guidance: The correct answer is "To ensure all nodes agree on the state of the blockchain". Consensus mechanisms are protocols that all participants in a blockchain network follow to maintain the integrity, security, and smooth operation of the blockchain. Their primary purpose is to ensure that all nodes in the network agree on the state of the blockchain, preventing fraud and errors. The other options are incorrect because: encrypting transactions is a separate security feature, not the main purpose of consensus mechanisms; mining new cryptocurrencies is a result of some consensus mechanisms (like Proof of Work) but not their primary purpose; and storing transaction data off-chain is not related to consensus mechanisms at all.
source.learningObjectives: SWBAT identify the primary purpose of consensus mechanisms in blockchain networks
